Title: Requires principals be informed of the physical address of the probation office where such principal must report and the telephone number for such office
Summary: Requires principals be informed of the physical address of the probation office where such principal must report and the telephone number for such office.
LawCode: Amd ยง410.10, CP L; amd ยง353.2, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law and the family court act, in relation to requiring principals be informed of the physical address of the probation office where such principal must report and the telephone number for such office
